title: Worktree-Aware Orchestration
description: Workers spawn in isolated git worktrees for parallel development. Orchestrator reads WAVES.md from scan-prioritize agent, spawns wave 1 workers in parallel (each in own worktree), on completion triggers merge queue followed by tests and retrospective, then spawns wave 2.
user_impact: Enables true parallel agent development with isolated workspaces, preventing merge conflicts and enabling concurrent feature development across multiple Claude Code instances
